title: City Tour of Lima from the Airport
description: Whether you have a layover in Lima or just want to maximize your sightseeing time; this tour ensures you don’t waste a moment. Be picked up on arrival at Jorge Chávez airport and head straight into the city to take in the highlights with your private guide. Explore the Miraflores and Barranco districts, take a walk through the Park of Love, and visit the busy Plaza de Armas. Your tour can be adapted to your preferences, so you could also visit a museum or shop for handicrafts at the market.
all_descriptions: Whether you have a layover in Lima or just want to maximize your sightseeing time; this tour ensures you don’t waste a moment. Be picked up on arrival at Jorge Chávez airport and head straight into the city to take in the highlights with your private guide. Explore the Miraflores and Barranco districts, take a walk through the Park of Love, and visit the busy Plaza de Armas. Your tour can be adapted to your preferences, so you could also visit a museum or shop for handicrafts at the market.

ItineraryThis is a typical itinerary for this productStop At:Miraflores District, Lima PeruLima tourist districtDuration: 30 minutesStop At:El Parque del Amor, Malecon Cisneros 18, Lima Perubeautiful park in front of the pacificDuration: 20 minutesStop At:Centro Historico de Lima, Plaza de Armas, Lima 15001 PeruWe will walk through its streets and visit its most beautiful churches and old housesDuration: 2 hoursStop At:Museo y Catacumbas Del Convento San Francisco de Asis Del Cusco, Plaza San Francisco S/N Al Costado Del Colegio Nacional de Ciencias, Cusco Perunice museum that is under the church of San FranciscoDuration: 50 minutesStop At:Plaza de Armas (Plaza Mayor), Jr. Junin and Jr. Carabaya, Lima Peruwe can see from the square the cathedral of Lima, the government palace and the municipality.Duration: 30 minutesStop At:ChocoMuseo Berlin, Calle Berlin 375, Lima 15074 PeruPodremos tomarnos un tiempo para visitar este bello museo del chocolate y probar del rico chocolate peruano llegado de la selva peruana.Duration: 20 minutesStop At:Plaza San Martin, Av. Nicolas de Pierola cdra. 9, Lima 15001 PeruPodremos ver uno de los monumentos mas hermosos al General San Martin héroe de de la independencia del Peru . También podremos visitar el mas hermoso hotel de Lima el Bolívar y su bella arquitectura del siglo pasado.Duration: 20 minutes

Option1New Jorge Chávez International Airport, Avenida Morales Duárez s/n, Callao, PeruLos estaremos esperando en el aeropuerto con un letrero que dice "Lima Discover' la hora de inicio del tour lo decide los clientes.
Option2New Jorge Chávez International Airport, Avenida Morales Duárez s/n, Callao, PeruNuestros guías los estarán esperando con un letrero que dice Lima Discover .
End:This activity ends back at the meeting point.

4 contributions

Exceptional!

Aug 2025 • Family
Our experience with Lima Discover was simply exceptional. The city tour we did with the guide Ishmael and the driver Luis exceeded all our expectations. Ishmael accompanied us with admirable delicacy and professionalism, sharing rich and detailed information about Lima’s history and culture, always with a smile and willing to answer all our questions. Luis, for his part, drove with total safety and kindness, making us feel comfortable at all times. Thanks to both of us, we not only got to know the city, but also had a warm, enriching and memorable experience.

Horrible service

May 2025 • Solo
Terrible experience. I booked a tour two weeks in advance and received confirmation. However, when I arrived at the airport, no one was there to pick me up. I called and spoke to someone who told me they were having issues and couldn’t pick me up. No one contacted me beforehand to inform me of any changes, which left me stranded and without time to make other arrangements. Completely unprofessional. I would never do business with them again.
Written May 11, 2025

Regular experience.

Sep 2024 • Family
We couldn't do the whole tour, because of traffic delays and that day there was a national football team game. We started by the coast, when we got to the historic center it was very congested. We should have done it the other way around.
It didn't include the catacombs either.

Ron T
2 contributions

Great overview of Lima

Jul 2024 • Solo
I had a long layover in Lima between flights and this was the perfect way to spend 6+ hours experiencing some of what Lima has to offer. I was met at the airport just outside the exit doors and escorted to the vehicle which was rather new and comfortable. My guide spoke excellent English and shared many interesting and relevant facts about the history of Lima. There was a driver who always had the car waiting for us. We visited the main city squares, wandered through the streets to see some daily life, I was given a tour of the Franciscan church and the catacombs (creepy and may not be for everyone, but very interesting,) and we then headed down to Miraflores for a view of the shore and a different aspect of the city. I invited my guide to join my for a delicious ceviche lunch at a restaurant that he recommended and we had a chance to discuss Peruvian life and culture. Overall, it was a terrific opportunity to see the city, have a great meal, learn from a local (isn't that why we travel anyway?) and pass some of the time before being returned to the airport for my onward flight. The only downside is that traffic in Lima is unbearable, but the driver was skillful and did his best to make his way while keeping us on schedule. I would highly recommend this family owned company and their day tour.
Written July 23, 2024
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Hola: mi idea es salir del aeropuerto alrededor de las 11 hs. hacia el centro histórico, recorrerlo, su plaza, el convento San Francisco y sus catacumbas; luego picar algo en algún puesto callejero; después encarar para Miraflores, Barraco, Puente de los suspiros, Parque del amor; Museo Larco, cenar en el museo alrededor de las 20 hs., para las 21.30 regresar al Aeropuerto en donde debo estar a las 22.00 hs. ¿es posible ello? ¿ cual es el costo para dos? Saludos.
